embed.title: What is the Consortium
embed.description: The Consortium / RIC:C is the official development entity responsible for designing, manufacturing and maintaining all facilities and infrastructure bearing the seal of the Infantry - including the Automated System sending this message.

fields.name: How can I join the Consortium?
fields.value: The only way of entrance into the Consortium is by submitting a self-made application to the presiding Creative Director or by personal invitation.

fields.name: Do I have to be an active member in RIC to join?
fields.value: The Consortium accepts anyone who excels in their area of expertise. Staff who are not actively serving in the Infantry are categorised as Contractors.
